body.name: Individually Wrapped Plastic Cutlery Set with Napkin + Salt & Pepper Packets in White (250 Count) Prewrapped Disposable Silverware Bags, Bulk Utensils: Fork, Knife, and Spoon for Togo Eating

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Stock Your Home Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Individually Wrapped Cutlery: Made of polypropylene, our disposable silverware packets are an easy and clean way to distribute plasticware for any event! Perfect for diners, food trucks, cafeterias, and food delivery services like uber eats.

Hygienic and Clean: You can rest easy knowing there's no risk of spreading harmful elements! With our disposable plastic cutlery set enclosed in a clear poly wrapper there is no exposure to unwanted elements, maintaining the cleanliness of your fork, knife, spoon, and napkin.

Salt & Pepper Packets: Ever ordered food on your lunch break and wished you could add some salt and pepper to your meal? We’ve included salt & pepper packets with our plastic utensils set so you can conveniently add extra seasoning to your meals.

Perfect for Any Occasion: Easily grab a to-go silverware plastic set to pack with your lunch, or distribute them at festivals, bbqs, birthday parties and dinners. No clean-up is needed - when you're done using, simply toss them in the trash.

Great Value Pack: Our value pack comes with 250 medium-weight white utensil packs. Each contains a 5.5” fork, 6.5” knife, 5.5” spoon, a 1-Ply 12” x 13” napkin (when fully opened), a packet of salt, and a packet of pepper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value product for price
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for a very small outdoor gathering I was having at my house where I wanted to provide individually wrapped utensils to ensure guest utensils stayed clean and were not exposed to potential germs (particularly COVID). I liked the idea of having wrapped forks, spoons and knives so that each guest had their own set rather than setting out the typical pile of plasticware that is unprotected for anyone to touch. The plasticware forks,etc themselves were of pretty decent quality. They were not extra strong/sturdy, but they were of sufficient sturdiness that they did not break or bend during use. I had no complaints from guests. I loved that they also came with a salt and pepper pack each so that I did not have to put out community salt and pepper shakers. I would definitely buy these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A big quantity comes in a big box but they are weak and better if you’re eating lite foods. They break easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice packaged product. Shipped fast. Exactly as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very convenient product
reviews.reviewText: These were perfect for our needs. A knife, fork and spoon along with salt and pepper and a napkin. Napkin is a little small and the utensils are of medium weight but perfect for what we needed. Convenient, individually wrapped and sanitary. Good value for money spent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutlery sets are perfect for any occasion!!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these cutlery sets to use at meeting we have once a month. Sometimes we have salad &sandwiches, sometmes pizza, sometimes we have only desserts but sometimes we have big mealswhere everyone brings a dish from home! What I received is perfect!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for work or gatherings
reviews.reviewText: These come in handy if you have lunch at work and or gatherings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sliver wear saver .
reviews.reviewText: My husband love taking our forks and spoons to work . He sometimes brings them back . These are very convenient . I like that it comes with a little salt and pepper pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ideal for soft foods/soup, fragile wrapper
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Opening the box: be careful when cutting the tape because there's no protective layer underneath and it only takes a tiny bit of depth to cut into the top layer sets. Better to peel the packaging tape off instead.Handle with care: I took one set out, gave it a light shake, and almost immediately the clear wrapper tore open. It should be ok if you're just planning to handle it right before use.The material bends easily under pressure but at least it doesn't seem prone to breaking (I hate it when they break and pieces fly off). The fork and knife should pierce/cut ok as long as the food is soft. I don't know if the other forks are the same, but the first one I took out had wonky tines.The salt and pepper are ok but I do wish the pepper was ground finer. The napkin material is smoother than I expected, almost like paper, but it should do the job.Overall it's ok as long as you're not looking for a set that feels sturdy and just want utensils that come in a complete set and serve their basic purpose.
Great for community bbqs or pancake breakfasts.... all individual, no one touching other peoples utensils!!
